traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The tough has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tough’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The tough makes two attacks, using Warhammer or Heavy Crossbow in any combination.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the tough pushes the target up to 10 feet straight away from itself.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range 100/400 ft. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) Piercing damage.
